specifications.label: Color Strength

specifications.label: Lightfastness
specifications.value: Excellent lightfastness with a rating of 8-9 on the Blue Wool Scale.

specifications.value: Neutral pH between 7-9.

specifications.label: Solvents
specifications.value: Water-based with minimal VOCs (Volatile Organic Compounds).

specifications.label: Adhesion
specifications.value: Excellent adhesion to various surfaces, including paper, board and fabric.

specifications.label: Drying Time
specifications.value: Surface dry 10 minutes, Full dry 1 hour
